name: Joe's Way
description:
The boy's name is Joe. You have to help him find and save the youngest fairy of the forest. The fairy is captured by a robot spider!

An easy platformer game for little kids with colorful environment and no complicated technics.

Two versions of the game a 64 bit and a 32 bit.

INSTRUCTIONS: Download the rar file, open it and double click the Joe's Way.exe file

VAT not included

ENJOY!
